findings.liver: homogenous attenuation, no focal lesions, no biliary dilatation
findings.pancreas: normal attenuation, no focal lesions, no ductal dilatation
findings.kidneys: normal and symmetric size, normal nephrogram, no lesions
findings.small bowel: normal caliber, wall thickness, and enhancement
findings.appendix: mildly enlarged at 8 mm with hazy increased attenuation in adjacent fat and hypervascularity
findings.vascular: no abdominal aortic aneurysm or atherosclerotic disease
findings.bones: no worrisome lesions or acute fractures
